00039 namespace TREX {
00040   namespace transaction {
00041     namespace details {
00042 
00052       class timeline {
00053       public:
00054        typedef timeline      base_type;
00055        typedef utils::Symbol id_type;
00056 
00065        static id_type const &get_id(base_type const &tl) {
00066          return tl.name();
00067        }
00068 
00069        typedef Relation              iterator;
00070        typedef client_set::size_type size_type;
00071 
00083        timeline(TICK date, utils::Symbol const &name);
00098        timeline(TICK date, utils::Symbol const &name, TeleoReactor &serv);
00100        ~timeline();
00101 
00108        utils::Symbol const &name() const {
00109          return m_name;
00110        }
00111 
00122        bool owned() const {
00123          return NULL!=m_owner;
00124        }
00137        bool owned_by(TeleoReactor const &r) const {
00138          return &r==m_owner;
00139        }
00153        TeleoReactor &owner() const {
00154          return *m_owner;
00155        }
00156 
00167        bool active() const {
00168          return owned() && !no_client();
00169        }
00180        bool no_client() const {
00181          return m_clients.empty();
00182        }
00191        size_type size() const {
00192          return m_clients.size();
00193        }
00200        Relation begin() {
00201          return Relation(this, m_clients.begin());
00202        }
00209        Relation end() {
00210          return Relation(this, m_clients.end());
00211        }
00212 
00219        TICK lastObsDate() const {
00220          return m_obsDate;
00221        }
00229        Observation const &lastObservation() const {
00230          return m_lastObs;
00231        }
00232 
00248        TICK look_ahead() const;
00262        TICK latency() const;
00263 
00264        void recall(goal_id const &g);
00265        void request(goal_id const &g);
00266 
00267       private:
00288        bool assign(TeleoReactor &r);
00315        void unassign(TICK date, bool demotion=false, bool control=true);
00344        bool subscribe(TeleoReactor &r, bool control);
00364        void unsubscribe(Relation const &rel);
00365 
00388        void postObservation(TICK date, Observation const &obs);
00389 
00390        void latency_update(TICK prev);
00391 
00392        utils::Symbol m_name;
00393        TeleoReactor *m_owner;
00394        client_set    m_clients;
00395        
00396        Observation   m_lastObs;
00397        TICK          m_obsDate;
00398        
00411        static utils::Symbol const  s_failed;
00412        
00413        friend class TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor;
00414        friend class TREX::transaction::Relation;
00415        friend class TREX::transaction::graph;
00416       }; //TREX::transaction::details::timeline

00418       typedef utils::pointer_id_traits<details::timeline> tl_ptr_id_traits;
00419       typedef utils::list_set<tl_ptr_id_traits>           timeline_set;

00431       class relation_iter 
00432        :public boost::iterator_facade< relation_iter,
00433                                    Relation const,
00434                                    boost::forward_traversal_tag > {
00435       public:
00437        relation_iter() {
00438          m_pos = m_last;
00439        }
00444        relation_iter(relation_iter const &other)
00445          :m_pos(other.m_pos), m_last(other.m_last), m_rel(other.m_rel) {}
00453        relation_iter(timeline_set::const_iterator const &it,
00454                     timeline_set::const_iterator const &last);
00456        ~relation_iter() {}
00457 
00458        
00459       private:
00460        friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00461 
00462        void increment();
00463        bool equal(relation_iter const &other) const;
00464        Relation const &dereference() const {
00465          return m_rel;
00466        }
00467        
00468        void next_valid();
00469 
00470        timeline_set::const_iterator m_pos, m_last;
00471        Relation m_rel;
00472       }; // relation_iter
